StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: PCGC: Congenital Heart Disease Genetic Network Study

Person.Organization: UNIVERSITY OF ILLINOIS AT CHICAGOUNIVERSITY OF CHICAGO

Policy.ic_specific_access_term: There are two consent groups for the Pediatrics Cardiac Genomics Consortium (PCGC): 1) Health/Medical/Biomedical (HMB). Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry; and 2) Disease Specific: Congenital Heart Disease (DS-CHD). Use of the data must be related to Congenital Heart Disease.

GSR_Access.gsr_mode_label: Unrestricted access (institution responded that the study is not sensitive without submitting a new Institutional Certification)

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical
ConsentGroup.name: HMB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Congenital Heart Disease)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CHD
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Congenital Heart Disease.

StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: PCGC: Congenital Heart Disease Genetic Network Study

Policy.ic_specific_access_term: There are two consent groups for the Pediatrics Cardiac Genomics Consortium (PCGC): 1) Health/Medical/Biomedical (HMB). Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry; and 2) Disease Specific: Congenital Heart Disease (DS-CHD). Use of the data must be related to Congenital Heart Disease.

ConsentGroup.name: HMB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry.

StudyInfo.StudyNameEntrez: PCGC: Congenital Heart Disease Genetic Network Study

Policy.ic_specific_access_term: There are two consent groups for the Pediatrics Cardiac Genomics Consortium (PCGC): 1) Health/Medical/Biomedical with IRB approval (HMB-IRB). Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval; and 2) Disease Specific: Congenital Heart Disease with IRB approval (DS-CHD-IRB). Use of the data must be related to Congenital Heart Disease. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval. For both: All requestors and data users must provide a local Institutional Review board [IRB] letter from their respective institution approving conduct of the proposed research project. Only full or expedited approvals will be accepted.

ConsentGroup.title: Health/Medical/Biomedical (IRB)
ConsentGroup.name: HMB-IRB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of this data is limited to health/medical/biomedical purposes, does not include the study of population origins or ancestry. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Congenital Heart Disease, IRB)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CHD-IRB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Congenital Heart Disease. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval.

Policy.acknowledgement_statement:
These data were generated by the Pediatric Cardiac Genomics Consortium (PCGC), under the auspices of the National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute’s Bench to Bassinet Program <http://www.benchtobassinet.org/>. Members of the PCGC or investigators who collaborated with the PCGC on a specific analysis for which data is being obtained through this dbGaP submission are requested to use the following statement of acknowledgement:
“The Pediatric Cardiac Genomics Consortium (PCGC) program is funded by the National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute, National Institutes of Health, U.S. Department of Health and Human Services through grants U01HL098123, U01HL098147, U01HL098153, U01HL098162, U01HL098163, and U01HL098188. This manuscript was prepared in collaboration with investigators of the PCGC and has been reviewed and/or approved by the PCGC. PCGC investigators are listed at http://www.benchtobassinet.com/PCGCcenters.asp”
Investigators who did not collaborate with the PCGC on a specific analysis for which data is being obtained through this dbGaP submission are requested to use the following statement of acknowledgment:
“The Pediatric Cardiac Genomics Consortium (PCGC) program is funded by the National Heart, Lung, and Blood Institute, National Institutes of Health, U.S. Department of Health and Human Services through grants U01HL098123, U01HL098147, U01HL098153, U01HL098162, U01HL098163, and U01HL098188. This manuscript was not prepared in collaboration with investigators of the PCGC, has not been reviewed and/or approved by the PCGC, and does not necessarily reflect the opinions of the PCGC investigators or the NHLBI.
Policy.ic_specific_access_term:
General Research Use (GRU) The data will only be used for research purposes.
Disease Specific: Congenital heart disease research only (CHD)Use of the dataset is limited to scientific research relevant to the etiology, prevention, treatment and late complications or treatment of congenital heart disease.
IRB approval is required for the use of this dataset.

ConsentGroup.title: General Research Use (IRB)
ConsentGroup.name: GRU-IRB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data is limited only by the terms of the model Data Use Certification. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval.

ConsentGroup.title: Disease-Specific (Congenital Heart Disease, IRB)
ConsentGroup.name: DS-CHD-IRB
ConsentGroup.Use-Restriction: Use of the data must be related to Congenital Heart Disease. Requestor must provide documentation of local IRB approval.
